diff_act: 1.provide an option to deactivate a user account

regen.absent_element: notification or alert when an account is deactivated
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify or alert the user and/or administrators when a user account is deactivated.
The system shall notify the user when their account is deactivated.

regen.absent_element: notification or alert for account deactivation
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify or alert the user when their account is deactivated.

label: If an account has any history associated with it, it can only be deactivated and not deleted.
absence: situation of an account has any history
